name: FurnishWEB
tag_list: furniture, sales-force-automation, furniture-portal, order-management, extranet, sfa, order-entry, order, invoice, inventory, photo-library
overview:
FurnishWEB is your subscription-based, Software as a Service (SaaS) dealer extranet for the home furnishings industry. Designed to expedite order processing and product inventory tracking, FurnishWEB optimizes partnerships between manufacturers, dealers, sales representatives, staff, and customers.

FurnishWEB serves the home furnishings industry including case goods, bedroom, dining room, home office & entertainment, mirrors & art, and accessories by providing software services that allow manufacturers to share information with their customers, sales representatives and staff over a secure web site.

FurnishWEB is much more than the typical Sales Force Automation (SFA) Tool. In addition to order tracking and management, FurnishWEB offers an extensive online Furniture Photo and Image Library making it easy for you to add images to your web site, produce catalogs, flyer, and marketing materials.

FurnishWEB’s Smart Sales is a web-based analysis tool that provides a territory-wide view of sales history by aggregating product, collections, retailers, finishes, and product types with current-to-previous year comparisons. Never has it been this easy for manufacturers to empower their furniture dealers and sales reps with critical sales and inventory information.
